song.title: Let Me Sleep

Flowered winds was where I lived Thought you burned, not froze for your sins Oh, I'm so tired, and cold Oh, when I was a kid...oh, how magic it seemed Oh, please let me sleep, it's Christmas time Oh...oh, when I was a kid...oh, how magic it seemed Oh, please let me sleep, it's Christmas time
Oh...oh, when I, if I was a kid...oh, how magic it seemed Oh, please let me dream, it's Christmas time
